A.name: Account
A.desc: The charges are to be charged to an account.

CA.name: Advance collect
CA.desc: The amount of freight or other charge on a shipment advanced by one transportation line to another or to the shipper, to be collected from consignee.

CC.name: Collect
CC.desc: A shipment on which freight charges will be paid by consignee.

CF.name: Collect, freight credited to payment customer

FO.name: FOB port of call
FO.desc: Title and control of goods pass to the buyer at port of call. Responsibility for export taxes and cost of documents for overseas shipments have not been specified.

IC.name: Information copy, no payment due
IC.desc: Transaction set has been provided for information only.

PA.name: Advance prepaid
PA.desc: Costs have been paid in advance.

PB.name: Customer pick-up/backhaul
PB.desc: Buyer's private carriage picks up the goods as a return load to the buyer's facility.

PC.name: Prepaid but charged to customer
PC.desc: shipping charges have been paid in advance of shipment but are charged back to consignee usually as line item on invoice for the purchased goods.

PE.name: Payable elsewhere
PE.desc: Place of payment not known at the begin of conveyance.

PO.name: Prepaid only
PO.desc: Payment in advance of freight and/or other charges prior to delivery of shipment at destination, usually by shipper at point of origin.

PP.name: Prepaid (by seller)
PP.desc: Seller of goods makes payment to carrier for freight charges prior to shipment.

PU.name: Pickup
PU.desc: Customer is responsible for payment of pickup charges at shipping point.

RC.name: Return container freight paid by customer

RS.name: Return container freight paid by supplier

TP.name: Third party pay
TP.desc: A third party, someone other than buyer or seller, is identified as responsible for payment of shipping charges.
